author: milos88
content:
Looking again at the spec for ephemeral data on history network, nothing is mentioned regarding ephemeral bodies and receipts. 
Does that mean that we shouldn't care about those until we have header with (historical summaries) proof for them?

author: kolbyml
content: If you are tracking the last 8192 blocks you can consider the bodies and receipts “proven”

author: milos88
content: I was more thinking in the context of the network requests. Should they be accepted if offered? Should they be queried/returned with FIND_CONTENT?

author: kolbyml
content: If you can prove it I think you should accept it
